items.sentence: Tom backed up towards the window and hid behind the curtain.
It might've been better just to do what Tom asked you to do.
It's a lot easier paddling a canoe downstream than upstream.
Tom walked into the restaurant with a big smile on his face.
I never realized that there were so many birds in this area.
What reason did Tom give you for not wanting to go with you?
Someone broke into my house last night and stole my shotgun.
I could've helped if you'd let me know that you needed help.
I tried to convince myself that I was doing the right thing.
This is one of the best restaurants that I've ever eaten in.
